subject: Problem with delivery of order
description_text:
order# SSN2833


This has had no update for an extended time. There is a problem with the
order and I need an update ASAP. I just received the order I made a few
WEEKS AFTER this order was placed. If the order is delayed any more I will
need to cancel the order and buy the product from AliExpress as they will
have it here to me in a week. Please answer immediately this is my second
email and I've had no answer
[image: PF&TCO]
*Guy Moulton*
*Warehouse Manager, Tampa*
Corporate: 704-522-0404
Mobile: 813-406-1577
